entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
